wikipedia_page.main: James Freeburn Fleming (7 January 1929 – 2019) was a Scottish professional footballer, who played as a full back.

response: Bobby Brown, Malcolm Newlands, Jimmy Fleming, Dennis Stokoe and Jack Bertolini were all recognised by the Football League and played in the Football League Third Division North vs. South Representative Games during the 1950s.
James, Jim, or Jimmy Fleming may refer to:
* Jimmy Fleming (footballer, born 1901) (1901–1969), Scottish footballer for Rangers
*Jimmy Fleming, 90, Scottish footballer (Workington).Jimmy Fleming (death announced on this date)
*August: Jimmy Fleming, 90, Stirling Albion and Berwick Rangers full back.Jimmy Fleming
